data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Jamnagar, Gujarat, India.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jamnagar, Gujarat, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Jamnagar, Gujarat, India to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the county of Jamnagar.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 23,761 believers in the county of Jamnagar the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Vasava people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, remind your church in Jamnagar, Gujarat, India that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Father, help the 23,761 believers in Jamnagar to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Jamnagar, Gujarat, India by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
